name: Darn Tough Midweight Hiker Boot Socks - Unisex
description: Midweight socks with lots of cushion, designed to wear inside your hiking boots for long days on the trail.  This quick-drying and breathable fabric ensures you are warm in the winter and cool in the summer.Made of merino wool, nylon and Lycra.Lots of high density cushioning in the foot base and shin ensure the sock is super comfy and durable.Ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
